column5: Nipissing trip is on Friday and i was wondering if im going to be trying some spinner fishing what colors would be best to use,for pike and SM LM bass? Any help would be appreciated! Thanks in advance. -Little Angler
Personally I'd use white & red spinners or black ones.  LM
I like the solid silver spinners.
These   and mepps black fury with chartreuse dots
i had good luck with a vibrex pink body with a silver blade
spinner baits?  or in line?   white white white white white for spinner baits with a silver blade   otherwise i think classic silver works best
orange cant go wrong with an orange colour for some smallies. also when its getting to be evening chuck some big gold mepps everything likes big gold mepps

For spinnerbaits you can't go wrong with white.  For in-lines I've always done great with a plain Mepps in rainbow for SM bass. Plain silver also is a good choice. On cloudy days go with gold or copper.
White with a gold blade, I don't know if I have any other colors! (if you're talking in-liners)

The common wisdom is to use metal blades, silver or brass on sunny days, because the sun will make them flash.  On overcast days, painted blades will show-up better. White, white and chartreuse and chartreuse all resemble many types of bait fish.  I also like to have a Fire-Tiger spinnerbait in my collection. Garry2R's
have em both already!haha but thanks
Never mind Spinnerbaits throw some Tube Jigs.  But i suggest White and blue Spinnerbaits and be sure you throw a trailer hook on them.
Grab yerself some Vibra Fox #3 spinners in Chrome. Thats all I can offer up on this,as Nip is to far away to fish. I got all the water I need right here.LOL Have a great time and be safe.
Black and orange, white, firetiger, white, and red and white.
